        <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js@4.4.7/dist/chart.umd.min.js"></script>
        <script>
        const trackerFallback = {
          walletAddress: '0x2FC6896bDFB507002D1A534313C67686111cDfdA',
          rpcUrl: 'https://polygon-bor-rpc.publicnode.com',
          usdcContract: '0x2791Bca1f2de4661ED88A30C99A7a9449Aa84174',
          decimals: 6,
          startingBalance: 10,
          targetBalance: 100,
          history: []
        };

        let walletChart;

        function fmtUsd(value, maxFrac = 6) {
          if (value == null || Number.isNaN(value)) return 'â€”';
          return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', {
            style: 'currency',
            currency: 'USD',
            minimumFractionDigits: 2,
            maximumFractionDigits: maxFrac
          }).format(value);
        }

        function fmtShortTs(iso) {
          if (!iso) return 'â€”';
          const d = new Date(iso);
          if (Number.isNaN(d.getTime())) return 'â€”';
          return d.toLocaleString('en-IN', {
            year: 'numeric', month: 'short', day: '2-digit',
            hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit', second: '2-digit',
            hour12: false, timeZoneName: 'short'
          });
        }

        function loadEmbeddedTracker() {
          try {
            const el = document.getElementById('walletTrackerSeed');
            if (!el) return trackerFallback;
            const data = JSON.parse(el.textContent || '{}');
            return { ...trackerFallback, ...data };
          } catch (_) {
            return trackerFallback;
          }
        }

        async function fetchLiveUsdcBalance(cfg) {
          const wallet = (cfg.walletAddress || '').replace(/^0x/, '').toLowerCase();
          const paddedWallet = wallet.padStart(64, '0');
          const callData = '0x70a08231' + paddedWallet; // balanceOf(address)

          const payload = {
            jsonrpc: '2.0',
            id: 1,
            method: 'eth_call',
            params: [
              { to: cfg.usdcContract, data: callData },
              'latest'
            ]
          };

          const res = await fetch(cfg.rpcUrl, {
            method: 'POST',
            headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
            body: JSON.stringify(payload)
          });

          if (!res.ok) throw new Error('rpc failed');
          const body = await res.json();
          if (body.error || !body.result) throw new Error('invalid rpc payload');

          const raw = BigInt(body.result);
          return Number(raw) / (10 ** (cfg.decimals || 6));
        }

        function buildHistory(cfg, liveBalance, liveTs) {
          const points = Array.isArray(cfg.history) ? [...cfg.history] : [];

          if (points.length === 0) {
            points.push({
              ts: liveTs,
              balance: Number(cfg.startingBalance ?? 10),
              source: 'bootstrap'
            });
          }

          const latest = points[points.length - 1];
          if (!latest || Math.abs(Number(latest.balance) - Number(liveBalance)) > 1e-9) {
            points.push({ ts: liveTs, balance: Number(liveBalance), source: 'live-rpc' });
          } else {
            latest.ts = liveTs;
            latest.source = 'live-rpc-refresh';
            latest.balance = Number(liveBalance);
          }

          // Keep recent points for a clean homepage chart.
          const recent = points.slice(-60);
          return {
            labels: recent.map(p => new Date(p.ts).toLocaleString('en-IN', {
              month: 'short', day: '2-digit', hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit', hour12: false
            })),
            balances: recent.map(p => Number(p.balance))
          };
        }

        function renderWalletChart(labels, balances, starting, target) {
          const ctx = document.getElementById('pnlChart');
          if (!ctx || !window.Chart) return;

          if (walletChart) {
            walletChart.destroy();
          }

          walletChart = new Chart(ctx, {
            type: 'line',
            data: {
              labels,
              datasets: [
                {
                  label: 'Wallet Balance ($)',
                  data: balances,
                  borderColor: 'rgba(231, 76, 139, 1)',
                  backgroundColor: 'rgba(231, 76, 139, 0.12)',
                  borderWidth: 2,
                  fill: true,
                  tension: 0.25,
                  pointRadius: 3
                },
                {
                  label: 'Starting ($10)',
                  data: labels.map(() => starting),
                  borderColor: 'rgba(76, 231, 139, 0.9)',
                  borderWidth: 1.5,
                  borderDash: [4, 4],
                  pointRadius: 0,
                  fill: false
                },
                {
                  label: 'Target ($100)',
                  data: labels.map(() => target),
                  borderColor: 'rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.9)',
                  borderWidth: 1.5,
                  borderDash: [6, 6],
                  pointRadius: 0,
                  fill: false
                }
              ]
            },
            options: {
              responsive: true,
              plugins: {
                title: { display: true, text: 'Wallet Tracker â€” $10 â†’ $100 Challenge', font: { size: 16 } },
                legend: { position: 'bottom' }
              },
              scales: {
                y: {
                  beginAtZero: true,
                  title: { display: true, text: 'USD' }
                }
              }
            }
          });
        }

        async function initWalletTracker() {
          const cfg = loadEmbeddedTracker();
          const liveTs = new Date().toISOString();

          let liveBalance;
          let usingFallback = false;

          try {
            liveBalance = await fetchLiveUsdcBalance(cfg);
          } catch (e) {
            usingFallback = true;
            const h = Array.isArray(cfg.history) && cfg.history.length > 0 ? cfg.history[cfg.history.length - 1] : null;
            liveBalance = h ? Number(h.balance) : Number(cfg.startingBalance ?? 10);
          }

          const starting = Number(cfg.startingBalance ?? 10);
          const target = Number(cfg.targetBalance ?? 100);
          const pnl = liveBalance - starting;

          const { labels, balances } = buildHistory(cfg, liveBalance, liveTs);
          renderWalletChart(labels, balances, starting, target);

          const walletEl = document.getElementById('walletBalanceValue');
          const pnlEl = document.getElementById('totalPnlValue');
          const syncEl = document.getElementById('walletLastUpdated');
          const statusEl = document.getElementById('statusLine');

          if (walletEl) walletEl.textContent = fmtUsd(liveBalance, 6);
          if (pnlEl) {
            pnlEl.textContent = (pnl >= 0 ? '+' : '') + fmtUsd(pnl, 6);
            pnlEl.style.color = pnl >= 0 ? '#4caf82' : '#e74c8b';
          }
          if (syncEl) syncEl.textContent = fmtShortTs(liveTs) + (usingFallback ? ' (history fallback)' : ' (live RPC)');

          if (statusEl) {
            statusEl.innerHTML = '<strong>Status</strong>: ' +
              (usingFallback
                ? 'ğŸ“š Research phase â€” wallet shown from tracker history (RPC unavailable)'
                : 'âœ… Live wallet sync active â€” homepage shows on-chain USDC balance');
          }
        }

        if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
          document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initWalletTracker);
        } else {
          initWalletTracker();
        }
        </script>
